location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'FACSIMILE DER KAART VAN DE PERZISCHE GOLF (1646) BEHOORENDE BIJ ROOBACKER'S SCHEEPSJOURNAAL'

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: Printed in colour on paperDimensions: 519 x 708mm, on sheet 609 x 914mm

mods.abstract: Facsimile of a 1646 map of the Persian Gulf from the ship journal of Captain Cornelis Roobacker. Published by the journal of the Royal Dutch Geographical Society ( Tijdschrift van het Koninklijk Nederlandsch Aardrijkskundig Genootschap), 1907.
